fields.subject: Welcome to {{settings.PROJECT_LONG_NAME}}
fields.content:
Dear {{ user.get_full_name }},

Welcome to {{ settings.PROJECT_LONG_NAME }}.

Thanks,

The {{ settings.PROJECT_LONG_NAME }} team
